channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 克里姆林宫的批评人士呼吁周日在俄罗斯投票站举行大规模抗议活动，这是总统选举的最后一天，普京的强硬统治➡️。
item.description:
Kremlin critics called for massive protests at Russian polling stations on Sunday for the final day of a presidential election that is guaranteed to cement Vladimir Putin's hardline rule
➡️ https://t.co/VR0yO7z2qm pic.twitter.com/sk93S9i7CI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: 在投票站扬声器播放的俄罗斯流行音乐声中，爱德华-伊什纳扎罗夫将选票投给了他认为唯一能带来和平的候选人：弗拉基米尔-普京
item.description:
To the sound of Russian pop music blasting from speakers at the polling station, Eduard Ishnazarov cast a ballot for the only candidate he thought could deliver peace: Vladimir Putin https://t.co/9DRZz2ajlF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 周六，一名 "极度危险 "的嫌犯在新泽西州涉嫌枪杀三名家庭成员后被拘留，当局称，经过数小时的努力才将其拘留。
item.description:
An "extremely dangerous" suspect was taken into custody in New Jersey on Saturday after allegedly shooting dead three family members, authorities said, following an hours-long effort to detain him https://t.co/9JJCTs7Ros

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 周六，乌克兰轰炸造成两人死亡，并导致俄罗斯一处石油设施起火，这是俄罗斯举行大选的第二天，大选的目的是巩固总统弗拉基米尔-普京的强硬统治。
item.description:
Ukrainian bombardments killed two people and set an oil facility ablaze in Russia on Saturday, the second day of showpiece elections guaranteed to cement President Vladimir Putin's hardline rule https://t.co/LXSAkKV9fQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 冰岛雷克雅未克半岛新的火山裂缝周六喷出熔岩，这是 12 月以来该地区发生的第四次火山爆发。
item.description:
Lava spewed Saturday from a new volcanic fissure on Iceland's Reykjanes peninsula, the fourth eruption to hit the area since December, authorities said https://t.co/ea4GRRXZPt

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗将在 7 月 28 日的选举中谋求第三个任期，在此之前的 11 年任期中，他饱受制裁、经济崩溃和广泛镇压的指责。
item.description:
Venezuela's President Nicolas Maduro will seek a third term in July 28 elections after 11 years in office marked by sanctions, economic collapse and accusations of widespread repression https://t.co/BHyFxnRB61

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 在斋月的第一个星期五晚上，塔巴提比一家在加沙市中心聚餐。
item.description:
Displaced by Israeli bombardment, the Tabatibi family gathered in central Gaza to eat together during the first Friday night of Ramadan.
An air strike hit the building where they were staying, killing 36 members of the family https://t.co/glppCXe4hm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 塞浦路斯表示，第二艘满载援助物资前往加沙的船只最早可能于周六启程，因为第一艘船只在成功运送货物后已从饱受战争蹂躏的领土返回。
item.description:
A second ship loaded with aid for Gaza could depart as early as Saturday, Cyprus said, as the first vessel returned from the war-ravaged territory after successfully delivering its cargo https://t.co/4OJgPUA5Wn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 爱尔兰队将于本周六在兰斯多恩路球场击败苏格兰队，加冕六国赛冠军，以弥补连续错失六国赛大满贯的遗憾 ➡️ #AFPSports #IREvSCO
item.description:
Ireland will seek to make up for the frustration of missing out on historic back-to-back #SixNations Grand Slams by being crowned tournament champions in beating Scotland at Lansdowne Road on Saturday ➡️ https://t.co/7ZjSfCJxHf #AFPSports #IREvSCO pic.twitter.com/GVhIsybnWQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 爱尔兰队将于本周六在兰斯当路球场击败苏格兰队，从而连续两届夺得六国赛冠军。#AFPSports 为您盘点可能决定比赛结果的三场对决：➡️ #IREvSCO
item.description:
Ireland can assure themselves of back-to-back #SixNations titles by beating Scotland at Lansdowne Road on Saturday.#AFPSports looks at three duels that could decide the outcome: ➡️ https://t.co/NO4bbbyEaq #IREvSCO pic.twitter.com/GQXrbQegM8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇿🇼 津巴布韦小学生骑自行车躲避大象的危险为了减少被野生动物袭击的风险，居住在自然保护区附近的孩子们得到了自行车，以减少他们步行上下学的时间。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇿🇼 Zimbabwe schoolkids given bikes to escape elephant danger

To reduce the risk of being attacked by wild animals, children living near a nature reserve have been given bicycles to reduce the time they spend on foot getting to and from school.

📹 Zinyange AUNTONY pic.twitter.com/yIU5uPkx1t

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普的女婿贾里德-库什纳周六宣布了在塞尔维亚和阿尔巴尼亚投资豪华房地产的计划，其中包括南斯拉夫军队总部旧址 ➡️。
item.description:
Jared Kushner, son-in-law of former US president Donald Trump, on Saturday announced plans to invest in luxury real estate in Serbia and Albania, including the old Yugoslav army headquarters site ➡️ https://t.co/xEeoeZ3bDy pic.twitter.com/cwlVGqcT9O

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 考文垂在补时阶段连入两球，在莫利纽克斯球场以 3-2 击败狼队，自 1987 年夺冠以来首次进入 #FACup 半决赛 ➡️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Coventry scored twice deep into stoppage time to stun Wolves 3-2 at Molineux and reach the #FACup semi-finals for the first time since they won the competition in 1987 ➡️ https://t.co/NniKW7e2v9 #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/uaCyVggD7E

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 周五，在墨西哥城最繁华的街区之一，约 200 人在街道中央集体小憩，庆祝 #世界睡眠日。➡️
item.description:
In one of Mexico City's busiest neighborhoods, about 200 people took a collective nap in the middle of the street on Friday to celebrate #WorldSleepDay.

➡️ https://t.co/04uXu6K8XL pic.twitter.com/AvVA587tjS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 周六，威尔士将在加的夫对阵意大利，乔治-诺斯（George North）将以激动的方式告别国际橄榄球赛场，威尔士将力争避免 20 多年来首次在 #SixNations 国家队中被横扫 ➡️ @stGuyer for #AFPSports #WALvITA
item.description:
George North is set for an emotional farewell to international rugby against Italy in Cardiff on Saturday as Wales seek to avoid a first #SixNations whitewash in more than 20 years ➡️ https://t.co/1xEBfS6IkI @stGuyer for #AFPSports #WALvITA pic.twitter.com/CvG03pKCr7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 本周图片（3 月 09-15 日）#AFP
item.description:
PICTURES OF THE WEEK (March 09-15) #AFP https://t.co/Av3sOO85Cj pic.twitter.com/uuUXAztnQ0

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 16, 2024

item.title: 英格兰队将于本周六迎战势头同样强劲的法国队，他们有很大机会击败爱尔兰队，夺得 #SixNations 锦标赛冠军，这在比赛开始时是没有多少人能够预料到的 ➡️ @IlltudDafydd for #AFPSports #FRAvENG
item.description:
England head to an equally resurgent France on Saturday holding an outside chance of pipping Ireland to a #SixNations title not many would have predicted at the start of the campaign ➡️ https://t.co/YJPUYx2Bgx @IlltudDafydd for #AFPSports #FRAvENG pic.twitter.com/kIMK6lJyvq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 在俄罗斯总统选举的第二天，乌克兰轰炸造成俄罗斯边境地区两人死亡，该地区的州长说，这次选举将巩固弗拉基米尔-普京的强硬统治 ⬇️。
item.description:
Ukrainian bombardments killed two people in a Russian border region on Saturday, its governor said, on the second day of presidential elections in Russia guaranteed to cement Vladimir Putin's hardline rule ⬇️ https://t.co/aUTtwcw4Mf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 周六，威尔士将在加的夫对阵意大利，乔治-诺斯（George North）将以激动的方式告别国际橄榄球赛场，威尔士将力争避免 20 多年来首次在 #SixNations 国家队中被横扫 ➡️ @stGuyer for #AFPSports #WALvITA

item.title: 瓜迪奥拉表示，凯文-德布劳内将缺席周六曼城对阵纽卡斯尔的 #FACup#四分之一决赛，比利时中场将在球队追逐三冠王的最后几周努力伤愈复出 ➡️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Pep Guardiola says Kevin De Bruyne will miss Manchester City's #FACup quarter-final against Newcastle on Saturday as the Belgium midfielder battles to return from injury for the final weeks of his side's treble chase ➡️ https://t.co/wCTaZ9KcT3 #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/SBWLCkzloF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: #印度大选投票将于 4 月 19 日开始：委员会

item.title: 视频：🇷🇺 俄罗斯将于 3 月 15 日至 17 日举行总统选举，尽管俄罗斯在乌克兰的竞选活动引发了动荡，但总统弗拉基米尔-普京几乎没有竞选对手，这将是他第五次获得六年任期。#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇷🇺 Russia is holding a presidential election from March 15-17 that is set to hand President Vladimir Putin his fifth six-year mandate, as he runs virtually unopposed, despite turmoil triggered by Russia's campaign in Ukraine.#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/YtN2k9Ot9f

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING 从第一艘援助船上卸下的所有货物将运抵加沙：非政府组织
item.description:
#BREAKING All cargo offloaded from first aid ship to reach Gaza: NGO pic.twitter.com/UjNiGxpWIm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 玛利亚-萨卡里（Maria Sakkari）用了三盘和四个赛点才战胜了美国公开赛冠军可可-高夫（Coco Gauff），从而与世界排名第一的伊加-斯维特克（Iga Swiatek）在 ATP-WTA 印第安维尔斯大师赛上一决高下。
item.description:
Maria Sakkari needed three sets and four match points to get past US Open champion Coco Gauff, setting up a title clash with world number one Iga Swiatek at the ATP-WTA Indian Wells Mastershttps://t.co/zJE46veiKK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 视频：东京惊叹于早开的樱花
item.description:
VIDEO: Tokyo marvels at the early blooming cherry blossoms pic.twitter.com/25gdZGGNsq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）涉嫌支付封口费一案的刑事审判将不会按计划于 3 月 25 日开始，因为负责监督此案的纽约法官下令至少推迟到 4 月中旬。
item.description:
Donald Trump's criminal trial over alleged hush money payments will not begin on March 25 as planned, after the New York judge overseeing the case ordered a delay until at least mid-April.https://t.co/ejHH9lFj4z pic.twitter.com/f2K21QwmMH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 16, 2024

item.title: 香港天主教会周五表示，根据香港即将实施的国家安全法，信徒向神父的忏悔将继续保密。
item.description:
The Catholic Church in Hong Kong said Friday that confessions by devotees to priests would remain confidential under the city's upcoming national security law.https://t.co/GCZMVaWSF5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024
